name: SHOOTER JUMPER
description:
The story of the two legends only varies with their temperament. Don't let them enter the opposite realm or they die. Let the orange shoot and blue jump and you'll find yourself in a harmony you have never seen, also a bit of annoyance you have never experienced.

CONTROLS-

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Tab - Switch Players

Space - Jump (Blue)

Left Click - Shoot (Orange)

Theme taken - Two views, Reset(Game resets)

BGM Credits-https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

SOUND FX Credits-https://www.zapsplat.com/
